chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib

Class HBConnectionListenerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib.HBConnectionListenerHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HBConnectionListener

    public class HBConnectionListenerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements HBConnectionListener
    Callback handler that passed each callback call onto the right handler.
